            <notes>Holy smokes, batman</notes>
        </history>
        <workout id="6214ec8b031a1f1f13633cc5">
            <name>Upper Body 1</name>
            <description>A1: Hip Thrusts. 3 sets, 12/10/8 reps. A2: Leg  Press. 3 sets, 12 reps. B1: Horizontal Back Extensions. 3 sets, 15-20 reps. B2: Ring Pushups. 5 sets, 5 reps. C1: High Incline DB Press. 3 sets, 6-8 reps. C2: Machine Shoulder Raise. 3 sets, 10-12 reps. D1: Cross Body Extensions. 3 sets, 15/12/10 reps. D2: Garhammer Raise. 3 sets, 15-20 reps.</description>
            <user>{
  _id: 6214f41d0dfbab2bce65cd65,
  user_id: '6214ec8b031a1f1f13633cc9',
  date: '2/22/2022'
}</user>
        </workout>
        <workout id="6214ec8b031a1f1f13633cc6">
            <name>Upper Body 2</name>
            <description>A1: Cross Body Extensions. 3 sets, 15/12/10 reps. A2: Garhammer Raise. 3 sets, 15-20 reps. B1: Hip Thrusts. 3 sets, 12/10/8 reps. B2: Leg  Press. 3 sets, 12 reps. C1: Horizontal Back Extensions. 3 sets, 15-20 reps. C2: Ring Pushups. 5 sets, 5 reps. D1: High Incline DB Press. 3 sets, 6-8 reps. D2: Machine Shoulder Raise. 3 sets, 10-12 reps.</description>
        </workout>
        <workout id="6214ec8b031a1f1f13633cc7">
            <name>Upper Body 3</name>
            <description>A1: High Incline DB Press. 3 sets, 6-8 reps. A2: Machine Shoulder Raise. 3 sets, 10-12 reps. B1: Cross Body Extensions. 3 sets, 15/12/10 reps. B2: Garhammer Raise. 3 sets, 15-20 reps. C1: Hip Thrusts. 3 sets, 12/10/8 reps. C2: Leg  Press. 3 sets, 12 reps. D1: Horizontal Back Extensions. 3 sets, 15-20 reps. D2: Ring Pushups. 5 sets, 5 reps.</description>
            <user>{
  _id: 6214f1b984d5052752210434,
  user_id: '6214ec8b031a1f1f13633cc9',
  date: '2/22/2022'
}</user>
        </workout>
        <workout id="6214f7840dfbab2bce65cdb2">
            <name>Tabata</name>
            <description>Because we gotta!</description>
            <user>{
  _id: 6214f7950dfbab2bce65cdb9,
